description: A protocol for interacting with the Hypersequent-calculus-based logic engine, allowing the agent to perform formal logical proofs.

rules.description: The `hdl_prover.py` tool should be used to check the provability of a logical sequent. This tool acts as a wrapper for the underlying Lisp-based prover.
rules.enforcement: The tool is used by invoking it from the command line with the sequent to be proved as an argument.
